elements.name: question1
rows: To avoid the debt trap, it is ideal to use Twint, prepaid credit cards or PayPal.
PayPal is available worldwide and has a high level of data protection.
Mobile payment systems are about as widespread as the "cash" payment option.
E-Bill is a Swiss invention, as is Twint.
Anonymity is high with mobile payment systems, PayPal and the LSV procedure.
Cryptocurrencies are not widely used for everyday payments. Only one canton allows them for the payment of taxes (although the prevalence is likely to increase annually).
The word "debit" means credit, i.e. we receive money in our bank account.
The most important credit cards in Switzerland are Diners or American Express.
Cash has the advantage of absolute spending control. The disadvantage, however, is that cash is unhygienic.
A Visa/Mastercard, Twint or PayPal account is required to make purchases in online stores.
